name: Knickknack Attack
description:
When the kid leaves the room, the toys say "what do we do now?" Answer: They FIGHT! Join them in this fast paced spit screen first person shooter, and decide the fate of the bedroom. The player with the most eliminations is the victor, and hold dominion over the bedroom floor.
This game was created in Unity Engine for our Year 2 group game project at college.

Two Game Controllers are required.

To play, just download and unzip the files.

Video Gameplay Walkthrough:
